desc: ACM Uninorte is a student chapter where our central axis is practice as a means to learn more. We want to redesign classroom learning and provide knowledge outside the University's line of learning.
point1_desc: The ACM Uninorte student group has dedicated itself to promoting learning.
point2_desc: We constantly explore new technologies and techniques.
point3_desc: Our group is made up of students from various areas of interest.
point4_desc: We take pride in our ability to provide educational experiences.
title: About us
title2: Strengthening learning through experience, innovation, and diversity
